name: ZX Death Row Revolt V0.09 DESKTOP
name_original: ZX Death Row Revolt V0.09 DESKTOP
description:
First of all, we are happy to  present this project to this beautiful community! 

The game is called "ZX Death Row Revolt". We are a very small - but dedicated! - team and we've been working on it for a couple months now. Although the game is in the alpha stage, we already like where it is going! Having said that, we would really appreciate any feedback you can give us. We want to know what you love, what you hate, what you'd like to see in the future and - of course - what doesn't work :) Since the game is in its early development stage, we are aware it has plenty of bugs, but you should be able to, at the very least, run it. So let us know if you find any trouble while at it!

Thanks in advance for you collaboration and game on!!

Please comment.

Thx for participate.

ZX Death Row Revolt is a strange proyect. Is an interactive music video and a experimental shooter proyect. Download, like and comment. We need your feedback. DOWNLOAD LINK https://jameschappfillmore.itch.io/zx-death-row-revolt-v009 Game Design and Programmer James Chapp Fillmore Itch.io: https://jameschappfillmore.itch.io/ Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCcgr3UM5PJtxBnE99TOq5PA Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/james_chapp_fillmore/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/4lg1z/ Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/user/James_Chapp_Fillmore Twitter: https://twitter.com/ChappJames Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/profile.php?id=100011402026398 Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/jameschappfillmore Ko-fi: https://ko-fi.com/jameschappfillmore Buymeacoffe: https://www.buymeacoffee.com/jameschapp Music by Santiago Iurissevich www.soundcloud.com/yateoi INSTAGRAM: @yateoi YOUTUBE: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC83s4F__sIOYJsXrgxBW1pA Credits Music Bassoid New music Mirta Kinex https://www.mixcloud.com/mirtakinex/ Sound Engineer Matias Massari UNITY Prototype Programmer Sofía Bombelli Development Consultant Sebastián Gioseffi Character Design James Chapp Fillmore Santiago Iurissevich #gamedev #indiedev #indiegame #indiegamedev #indieworldorder #indiedevhour #gamedevelopment #gaming #games #gameidea #earlyaccess #gamemaker #madewithgamemaker #gamemakerstudio2 #gamedesign #coding #programing #bug #pixelart #pixeldrawing #pixel3 #yellow #characterdesign #characterillustration #characterart #pixeldesign #draw #drawing #pixels #pixelperfect
